Package controller

Class RecordsController

java.lang.Object
controller.RecordsController
public class RecordsController extends Object
This Records Controller class is responsible for managing and handling various records (Medical, Appointment, Payment) in the system. This class provides functionality to generate record IDs, add, update, delete, and retrieve records from the repository.

  • Method Details

    • generateRecordID

      public static String generateRecordID(Record recType)
      Generates a unique record ID based on the record type.
      Parameters:
      recType - the type of record (Appointment, Payment, or Medical)
      Returns:
      a unique record ID as a string

    • checkRecordsDuplication

      public Boolean checkRecordsDuplication(String UID, Record recType)
      Checks if a record of the specified type already exists for a given UID.
      Parameters:
      UID - the unique identifier of the record
      recType - the type of record to check (Appointment, Payment, or Medical)
      Returns:
      true if a record exists for the given UID, otherwise false

    • addMedicalRecord

      public void addMedicalRecord(MedicalRecord mr)
      Adds a new medical record to the repository.
      Parameters:
      mr - the MedicalRecord object to be added

    • updateRecord

      public Boolean updateRecord(String recordID, Record recType, String status, String doctorID, String patientID, LocalDateTime updatedDate)
      Updates an existing record based on the record type and provided details.
      Parameters:
      recordID - the ID of the record to be updated
      recType - the type of record (Appointment, Payment, or Medical)
      status - the status to be set for the record
      doctorID - the doctor ID to be set for the record
      patientID - the patient ID to be set for the record
      updatedDate - the date and time when the record was updated
      Returns:
      true if the record was successfully updated, otherwise false

    • getAppointmentOutcomeRecordByPatientId

      public ArrayList<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> getAppointmentOutcomeRecordByPatientId(String patientID)
      Retrieves a list of appointment outcome records for a given patient ID. This method retrieves all appointment outcome records related to the patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose appointment outcome records are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects associated with the given patient ID, or an empty list if no records are found
